data.title: MyGram
data.description: An API for an Instagram-like application. Built with Gin, Gorm & JWT for the user authentication.

data.title: Happy Monniversary
data.description: A web application to collect wishes for a friend's birthday. Utilize Notion's API as the database to save all the wishes.

data.title: Klinik Pintar Clone
data.description: Clone one of Klinik Pintar's web page, using their REST API to display the clinics' data.

data.title: MIG Company Web
data.description: A responsive web application for company profile, using a REST API to do CRUD operation for costumers' data.

data.title: Cakrawala
data.description: A simple mobile payment application, built with Flutter and Golang

data.description: A simple health facility finder for Android device, built with Kotlin.
